lead_paragraph: On Monday Bruin Sports Capital is expected to announce Courtside Ventures, a new $35 million venture investment firm to be based in Detroit and New York that is meant to invest in nascent sports and media technology start-ups.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

snippet: On Monday Bruin Sports Capital is expected to announce Courtside Ventures, a new $35 million venture investment firm to be based in Detroit and New York that is meant to invest in nascent sports and media technology start-ups.

headline.main: Bruin Sports to Team Up With Others as Investor
headline.print_headline: Bruin Sports to Team Up With Others as Investor

abstract: George Pyne will announce his company Bruin Sports Capital has set up venture investment firm Courtside Ventures; it will invest in new sports and media technology start-ups.
